name: html-colors
title: HTML Colors
description: Search through pallettes of standard HTML colors. Offers basic + extended set. Search by name or browse by looking at the color itself.
author: Synacek

commands.name: html-color
commands.title: Search HTML Colors
commands.description: Quickly find HTML colors by name, hex, or RGB. Supports fuzzy search with typos and shows both basic and extended color sets.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
